The entire team cares deeply about our patients, employees, and communities, and we have made the incredibly difficult decision to continue to provide emergency dental work only to ensure we are playing our part to slow the spread of Coronavirus (COVID-19). New Image Dental is suspending all elective medical and surgical procedures, including all elective dental procedures.

Services

See all
Cosmetic dentistry

Top Cosmetic Dentist with results in Just One Visit. Our premier cosmetic dentistry facility is fully equipped with cutting-edge equipment for painless, quality work.

Reed more
Pain-free dentistry

Helping patients who have an overwhelming fear of the dentist since 2001. We will do everything to help you to feel comfortable on your visit. Specializing in sedation dentistry.

Reed more
Dental implamts

Dental implants provide a strong foundation for a beautiful new smile with permanent or removable replacement teeth that improve appearance and overall oral health.

Reed more
Dental bridges

Dental bridges are a long lasting, natural looking option for replacing teeth. Bridges look great, so no one will be able to tell that you ever had missing teeth.

Reed more
Teeth whitening

Erase years of tooth stains and discoloration teeth. Teeth whitening by top dentist is more effective with greater control and far better results.

Reed more
Root Canal

Root canal is necessary to stop decay, infections and repair damage. During the procedure tooth is cleaned and infections are removed - saving your tooth.

Meet our Dentists

See all

The entire team cares deeply about our patients, employees, and communities, and we have made the incredibly difficult decision to continue to provide emergency dental work only to ensure we are playing our part to slow the spread

Marina Adams, DDS

After moving to the United States and successfully passing the Dental Board of California examination she started to practice dentistry emphasizing gentle and pain free techniques.

Reed more
Rachal Liverman

Dr. Liverman knows open communication is key, and she always takes the time to chat with each patient. It is her goal to make each patient feel like family and provide honest, gentle, and pain free dentistry.

Reed more
Jay Layson

Dr. Layson is very personable and spends quality time with her patients, getting to know them before she begins any treatment. With her gentle touch Dr Layson gives her patients the assurance of a pain-free visit, and they love her for it

Reed more
